thread.title: Authorities track Lamar Odom's stay at Nevada brothel (Yahoo Sports)
thread.title_full: Authorities track Lamar Odom's stay at Nevada brothel (Yahoo Sports)

author: ASFN Admin
title: Authorities track Lamar Odom's stay at Nevada brothel (Yahoo Sports)
text: Posts: 54,297 Authorities track Lamar Odom's stay at Nevada brothel (Yahoo Sports) Authorities are retracing Lamar Odom's $75,000 visit to the brothel where he was found unconscious as the former NBA and reality TV star remains hospitalized and the Kardashians spar with the brothel owner over media attention surrounding the ordeal. There's been no official word on Odom's condition, but the Rev. Jesse Jackson visited him Wednesday and said he's on life support. Odom's grandmother, Florence Odom, declined to comment on his status Thursday, saying she was becoming distressed at unfounded speculation that her grandson would be taken off life support.
